name: FileManager.SearchPathDomainMask
desc: Domain constants specifying base locations to use when you search for significant directories.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a search path domain mask.

items.name: static var userDomainMask: FileManager.SearchPathDomainMask
items.desc: The user’s home directory—the place to install user’s personal items (~).

items.name: static var localDomainMask: FileManager.SearchPathDomainMask
items.desc: The place to install items available to everyone on this machine.

items.name: static var networkDomainMask: FileManager.SearchPathDomainMask
items.desc: The place to install items available on the network (/Network).

items.name: static var systemDomainMask: FileManager.SearchPathDomainMask
items.desc: A directory for system files provided by Apple (/System) .
